history.proof: intros a b c H1 H2. sauto depth: 3.

chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.```", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
A: Set
A1: A
A0: A
eqA: A -> A -> Prop
plusA: A -> A -> A
invA: A -> A
multA: A -> A -> A
minusA: A -> A -> A
divA: A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A
cs: CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA
eqA_dec: forall a b : A, {eqA a b} + {~ eqA a b}
n: nat
ltM: mon n -> mon n -> Prop
ltM_dec: forall a b : mon n, {ltM a b} + {ltM b a} + {a = b}
os: OrderStructure (mon n) (zero_mon n) ltM (mult_mon n)
eqT_refl: reflexive (Term A n) (eqT (A:=A) (n:=n))

Goal:
forall a b c : Term A n, eqT (A:=A) (n:=n) a b -> ltT c a -> ltT c b

Premises:
CoefStructure : forall (A : Set) (A0 : A), A -> forall eqA : A -> A -> Prop, (A -> A -> A) -> (A -> A) -> (A -> A -> A) -> (A -> A -> A) -> (A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A) -> Prop
eqT : forall (A : Set) (n : nat), Term A n -> Term A n -> Prop

ltT = fun a b : Term A n => ltM (T2M (A:=A) (n:=n) a) (T2M (A:=A) (n:=n) b) : Term A n -> Term A n -> Prop

zero_mon : forall d : nat, mon d

left : ?A -> {?A} + {?B} where ?A : [A : Set A0 : A A1 : A eqA : A -> A -> Prop plusA : A -> A -> A invA : A -> A minusA : A -> A -> A multA : A -> A -> A divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 ->...-> Prop ltM_dec : forall a b : mon n, {ltM a b} + {ltM b a} + {a = b} os : OrderStructure (mon n) (zero_mon n) ltM (mult_mon n) eqT_refl := Term.eqT_refl A n : reflexive (Term A n) (eqT (A:=A) (n:=n)) |- Prop]

nil : list ?A where ?A : [A : Set A0 : A A1 : A eqA : A -> A -> Prop plusA : A -> A -> A invA : A -> A minusA : A -> A -> A multA : A -> A -> A divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 ->...-> Prop ltM_dec : forall a b : mon n, {ltM a b} + {ltM b a} + {a = b} os : OrderStructure (mon n) (zero_mon n) ltM (mult_mon n) eqT_refl := Term.eqT_refl A n : reflexive (Term A n) (eqT (A:=A) (n:=n)) |- Type]
cons : ?A -> list ?A -> list ?A where ?A : [A : Set A0 : A A1 : A eqA : A -> A -> Prop plusA : A -> A -> A invA : A -> A minusA : A -> A -> A multA : A -> A -> A divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 ->...-> Prop ltM_dec : forall a b : mon n, {ltM a b} + {ltM b a} + {a = b} os : OrderStructure (mon n) (zero_mon n) ltM (mult_mon n) eqT_refl := Term.eqT_refl A n : reflexive (Term A n) (eqT (A:=A) (n:=n)) |- Type]
eqT_compat_ltTr : forall a b c : Term A n, eqT (A:=A) (n:=n) b c -> ltT a b -> ltT a c
eqT_compat_ltTl : forall a b c : Term A n, eqT (A:=A) (n:=n) b c -> ltT b a -> ltT c a
ltT_eqTr : forall a b c : Term A n, eqT (A:=A) (n:=n) a b -> ltT a c -> ltT b c
ltT_eqT : forall a b c d : Term A n, eqT (A:=A) (n:=n) a b -> eqT (A:=A) (n:=n) c d -> ltT a c -> ltT b d
plusTerm_comp_r : forall (A : Set) (A0 A1 : A) (eqA : A -> A -> Prop) (plusA : A -> A -> A) (invA : A -> A) (minusA multA : A -> A -> A) (divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A), CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA -> forall (n : nat) (a b c : Term A n), eqT (A:=A) (n:=n) c a -> eqT (A:=A) (n:=n) c b -> eqTerm eqA (n:=n) a b -> eqTerm eqA (n:=n) (plusTerm plusA (n:=n) c a) (plusTerm plusA (n:=n) c b)
plusTerm_comp_l : forall (A : Set) (A0 A1 : A) (eqA : A -> A -> Prop) (plusA : A -> A -> A) (invA : A -> A) (minusA multA : A -> A -> A) (divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A), CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA -> forall (n : nat) (a b c : Term A n), eqT (A:=A) (n:=n) a c -> eqT (A:=A) (n:=n) b c -> eqTerm eqA (n:=n) a b -> eqTerm eqA (n:=n) (plusTerm plusA (n:=n) a c) (plusTerm plusA (n:=n) b c)
eqTerm_plusTerm_comp : forall (A : Set) (A0 A1 : A) (eqA : A -> A -> Prop) (plusA : A -> A -> A) (invA : A -> A) (minusA multA : A -> A -> A) (divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A), CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA -> forall (n : nat) (a b c d : Term A n), eqT (A:=A) (n:=n) a c -> eqT (A:=A) (n:=n) b d -> eqTerm eqA (n:=n) a b -> eqTerm eqA (n:=n) c d -> eqTerm eqA (n:=n) (plusTerm plusA (n:=n) a c) (plusTerm plusA (n:=n) b d)
moreCoefStructure.A_sep : forall (A : Set) (A0 A1 : A) (eqA : A -> A -> Prop) (plusA : A -> A -> A) (invA : A -> A) (minusA multA : A -> A -> A) (divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A), CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA -> (forall a b : A, {eqA a b} + {~ eqA a b}) -> forall a b : A, eqA (multA a b) A0 -> eqA a A0 \/ eqA b A0
nzeroP_multTerm : forall (A : Set) (A0 A1 : A) (eqA : A -> A -> Prop) (plusA : A -> A -> A) (invA : A -> A) (minusA multA : A -> A -> A) (divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A), CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA -> (forall a b : A, {eqA a b} + {~ eqA a b}) -> forall (n : nat) (a b : Term A n), ~ zeroP A0 eqA (n:=n) a -> ~ zeroP A0 eqA (n:=n) b -> ~ zeroP A0 eqA (n:=n) (multTerm multA (n:=n) a b)
multTerm_zeroP_div : forall (A : Set) (A0 A1 : A) (eqA : A -> A -> Prop) (plusA : A -> A -> A) (invA : A -> A) (minusA multA : A -> A -> A) (divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A), CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA -> (forall a b : A, {eqA a b} + {~ eqA a b}) -> forall (n : nat) (a b : Term A n), zeroP A0 eqA (n:=n) (multTerm multA (n:=n) a b) -> zeroP A0 eqA (n:=n) a \/ zeroP A0 eqA (n:=n) b

eqTerm_multTerm_comp : forall (A : Set) (A0 A1 : A) (eqA : A -> A -> Prop) (plusA : A -> A -> A) (invA : A -> A) (minusA multA : A -> A -> A) (divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A), CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA -> forall (n : nat) (a b c d : Term A n), eqTerm eqA (n:=n) a b -> eqTerm eqA (n:=n) c d -> eqTerm eqA (n:=n) (multTerm multA (n:=n) a c) (multTerm multA (n:=n) b d)
multTerm_plusTerm_dist_r : forall (A : Set) (A0 A1 : A) (eqA : A -> A -> Prop) (plusA : A -> A -> A) (invA : A -> A) (minusA multA : A -> A -> A) (divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A), CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA -> forall (n : nat) (a b c : Term A n), eqTerm eqA (n:=n) (plusTerm plusA (n:=n) (multTerm multA (n:=n) c a) (multTerm multA (n:=n) c b)) (multTerm multA (n:=n) c (plusTerm plusA (n:=n) a b))
eqT_zerop_is_eqTerm : forall (A : Set) (A0 A1 : A) (eqA : A -> A -> Prop) (plusA : A -> A -> A) (invA : A -> A) (minusA multA : A -> A -> A) (divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A), CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA -> forall (n : nat) (a b : Term A n), eqT (A:=A) (n:=n) a b -> zeroP A0 eqA (n:=n) a -> zeroP A0 eqA (n:=n) b -> eqTerm eqA (n:=n) a b
zeroP_dec : forall (A : Set) (A0 : A) (eqA : A -> A -> Prop), (forall a b : A, {eqA a b} + {~ eqA a b}) -> forall (n : nat) (x : Term A n), {zeroP A0 eqA (n:=n) x} + {~ zeroP A0 eqA (n:=n) x}
zeroP_plusTermr : forall (A : Set) (A0 A1 : A) (eqA : A -> A -> Prop) (plusA : A -> A -> A) (invA : A -> A) (minusA multA : A -> A -> A) (divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A), CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA -> forall (n : nat) (a b : Term A n), eqT (A:=A) (n:=n) a b -> zeroP A0 eqA (n:=n) b -> eqTerm eqA (n:=n) a (plusTerm plusA (n:=n) a b)

```coq
intros a b c H1 H2.
apply ltT_eqTr with (b := b) at 2.
- assumption.
- apply eqT_compat_ltTr with (b := a) at 1.
  + assumption.
  + assumption.
Qed.

original: intros a b c H1 H2.
